input.sentences: the marathon was coming to an end
and the guy could not believe it .
and a guy won a medal .
the capes at the end were the coolest .
output.sentences: We were coming to the end of the marathon.
I saw a guy walking away from the scene quickly and I hesitated flashing back to what happened in Boston in 2013.
I realized all was well, and joined the other finishers fast to complete the race.
I got a medal from the guy who volunteered to hand them out.
We weren't looking the coolest in our capes at the end of it all, but we were happy to have accomplished the race.
